info.name: OBSCURE LITTLE BEASTIES liquid compact 2013/12
info.description:
This style to makes easy to read the "OBSCURE LITTLE BEASTIES" blog. 
The window width that can display without a horizontal scroll bar is 800 pixels at the minimum.This is also valid in large window width. 
* I'm using this style on Opera12.16＋Stylish 
* Also use ABP and register EasyList+EasyPrivacy and ABPJapanese Filters. 
* sorry, this is computer aided translation
